statements: SELECT * FROM Orders
SELECT customer_name, order_date, status FROM Orders
SELECT order_id, customer_name, order_date, status FROM Orders
SELECT * FROM Orders WHERE status='PENDING'
SELECT order_id, customer_name, order_date FROM Orders ORDER BY order_date DESC
SELECT * FROM Orders WHERE order_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, order_date FROM Orders WHERE status = 'Pending' ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT order_description FROM Orders WHERE customer_name = 'John Doe' AND status = 'Completed';
SELECT * FROM Orders WHERE status = 'Pending' AND order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT order_id, customer_name, status FROM Orders ORDER BY customer_name ASC, order_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE order_status = 'Pending';
SELECT customer_name, order_date FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT order_id, customer_name, order_date FROM orders WHERE customer_name = 'John' AND order_status = 'Complete';
SELECT order_id, customer_name, order_date FROM orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT schedule_id, printer_name, schedule_date, schedule_time FROM scheduling ORDER BY schedule_date, schedule_time DESC;
SELECT order_id, customer_name, order_date FROM orders WHERE order_status = 'Pending' ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM orders INNER JOIN scheduling ON orders.order_id = scheduling.order_id WHERE schedule_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' ORDER BY schedule_time;
SELECT DISTINCT customer_name FROM orders WHERE LENGTH(customer_name) > 5;
SELECT order_id, customer_name, schedule_date, schedule_time FROM orders JOIN scheduling ON orders.order_id = scheduling.order_id WHERE orders.order_date > '2022-02-15';

SELECT order_id, customer_name, order_date, schedule_date FROM orders LEFT JOIN scheduling ON orders.order_id = scheduling.order_id WHERE order_date IS NOT NULL ORDER BY order_date ASC, schedule_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Orders
SELECT order_id, customer_name FROM Orders
SELECT product_name, price FROM Products
SELECT order_id, order_date, order_status FROM Orders
SELECT product_id, product_name, price, product_description FROM Products
SELECT * FROM Orders;
SELECT order_id, customer_name, order_date, order_status FROM Orders WHERE order_status='shipped';
SELECT * FROM Products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM Products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT schedule_id, product_name, customer_name FROM Schedule s JOIN Products p ON s.product_id = p.product_id JOIN Orders o ON s.order_id = o.order_id;
SELECT * FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, order_status FROM orders WHERE order_status = 'Shipped';
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT printer_name, printer_model, printer_status FROM 3d_printers WHERE printer_status = 'Available';
SELECT order_id, printer_id, print_date FROM printing_schedule WHERE print_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_name, order_date, order_status FROM orders WHERE order_status='processing' OR order_status='shipped';
SELECT product_name, price, category FROM products WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT printer_name, printer_model, printer_status FROM 3d_printers WHERE printer_status='available';

SELECT o.customer_name, p.product_name, ps.print_date FROM orders o JOIN products p ON o.order_id = p.product_id JOIN printing_schedule ps ON o.order_id = ps.order_id ORDER BY ps.print_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM Orders;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customers;
SELECT printer_name, location, capacity FROM Printers ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT file_name, file_size, file_type FROM PrintFiles WHERE file_size > 1000;
SELECT order_date, customer_id, status FROM Orders WHERE status='pending';
SELECT order_id, order_date, customer_id, status FROM Orders WHERE status='Processing';
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM Customers WHERE customer_id=12345;
SELECT printer_name, location, capacity FROM Printers WHERE location='New York';
SELECT file_name, file_type FROM PrintFiles WHERE file_size > 1000;
SELECT schedule_id, printer_id, order_id, start_time, end_time FROM Schedules ORDER BY start_time DESC;
